mapper.select: select day_id, day_title, date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date, date_format(create_date,'%m-%d') create_date_show, day_stick from cahg_day_info where day_status = '0' ORDER BY day_stick DESC, create_date DESC limit 0,7

select day_title,day_content,author, (select name from sys_dept d where d.dept_id = c.dept_id) dept_name, author,date_format(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date, day_stick from cahg_day_info c where day_id = #{day_id}

select count(*) from cahg_day_info where day_status = '0' and 1 = 1
and (day_title like #{title} OR DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y%m%d') like #{title})
